thread.title: Maryland releases statement in response to report Randy Edsall will be fired
thread.title_full: Maryland releases statement in response to report Randy Edsall will be fired

author: Daniel Gallen
title: Maryland releases statement in response to report Randy Edsall will be fired
text:
Daniel Gallen Contact Reporter Maryland releases statement after report on Randy Edsall's status. 
Maryland released a statement Thursday in reponse to a report that coach Randy Edsall will be fired after this weekend’s game at No. 1 Ohio State. 
"Randy Edsall is our head football coach, and he’ll be on the sidelines Saturday against Ohio State," a school spokesman said. 
The Terps have lost their past two games against West Virginia and Michigan by a combined 73-6. It doesn’t get any easier Saturday at the defending national champion Buckeyes, who beat the Terps, 52-24, in College Park a year ago. 
Edsall is 22-33 with an 0-11 record against top 25 teams during his four-plus year tenure in College Park. Maryland is 2-3 this season.
